actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to protect nondisclosure of information and sources of information coming into the possession of the news media.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that anyone who is engaged in gathering information intended for publication or broadcast cannot be required by a court, the legislature, or any administrative body, to disclose, before the Congress or any other Federal court or agency, any information or the source of any information procured for publication or broadcast.

titles.title: A joint resolution to protect nondisclosure of information and sources of information coming into the possession of the news media.
